title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Housing, Local Government and Heritage
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Housing, Local Government and Heritage 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited housing local government heritage (delegation ministerial functions) (no 2) order 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage conferred on him - 

(a) 

by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in Part 1 
of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the enactments specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

(c) 

under the provisions of the instruments specified in Part 3 of the 
Schedule, 

(d) under the instruments specified in Part 4 of the Schedule, 

and 

(e) 

under the instruments specified in Part 5 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Christopher O’Sullivan, Minister of State at the Department of 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [365] 3
